verses.translation_en: By the dawn
verses.translation_zh: 誓以黎明，

verses.translation_en: And [by] ten nights
verses.translation_zh: 与十夜，

verses.translation_en: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
verses.translation_zh: 与偶数和奇数，

verses.translation_en: And [by] the night when it passes,
verses.translation_zh: 与离去的黑夜，

verses.text: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
verses.translation_en: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
verses.translation_zh: 对於有理智者，此中有一种盟誓吗？

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation_en: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
verses.translation_zh: 难道你不知道你的主怎样惩治阿德人---

verses.translation_en: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
verses.translation_zh: 有高柱的伊赖姆人吗？

verses.text: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
verses.translation_en: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
verses.translation_zh: 像那样的人，在别的城市里还没有被创造过的---

verses.translation_en: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
verses.translation_zh: 怎样惩治在山谷里凿石为家的赛莫德人，

verses.translation_en: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
verses.translation_zh: 怎样惩治有武力的法老。

verses.translation_en: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
verses.translation_zh: 这等人曾在国中放肆，

verses.translation_en: And increased therein the corruption.
verses.translation_zh: 乃多行不义，

verses.translation_en: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
verses.translation_zh: 故你的主把一种刑罚，倾注在他们身上。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
verses.translation_zh: 你的主，确是监视的。

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation_en: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
verses.translation_zh: 至於人，当他的主考验他，故优待他，而且使他过安逸生活的时候，他说：我的主优待我了。

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
verses.translation_en: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
verses.translation_zh: 当他考验他，故节约他的给养的时候，他说：我的主凌辱我了。

verses.translation_en: No! But you do not honor the orphan
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然！但你们不优待孤儿，

verses.translation_en: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
verses.translation_zh: 你们不以济贫相勉励，

verses.translation_en: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
verses.translation_zh: 你们侵吞遗产，

verses.translation_en: And you love wealth with immense love.
verses.translation_zh: 你们酷爱钱财。

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation_en: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然！当大地震动复震动，

verses.translation_en: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
verses.translation_zh: 你的主的命令，和排班的天神，同齐来临的时候，

verses.text: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation_en: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，火狱将被拿来；在那日，人将觉悟，但觉悟於他有何裨益呢？

verses.translation_en: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
verses.translation_zh: 他将说：但愿我在世的时候曾行善事。

verses.translation_en: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，任何人，不用他的那种刑罚惩治别人；

verses.translation_en: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
verses.translation_zh: 任何人，不用他的那种束缚束缚别人。

verses.translation_en: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
verses.translation_zh: 安定的灵魂啊！

verses.translation_en: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
verses.translation_zh: 你应当喜悦地，被喜悦地归於你的主。

verses.translation_en: And enter among My [righteous] servants
verses.translation_zh: 你应当入在我的众仆里；

verses.translation_en: And enter My Paradise."
verses.translation_zh: 你应当入在我的乐园里。
